description:
PyData New York City 2017

Slides: /redirect?event=video_description&v=Pm4ZQMKoz7Q&redir_token=ZfA3KGQ1REhsbLBoggrbZzXJziV8MTUxOTY0NTA1OEAxNTE5NTU4NjU4&q=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.slideshare.net%2Frosentep%2Fdiving-into-the-deep-end-of-clothing-styles-pydata-nyc-2017

We recently resorted to deep learning-based methods for understanding the styles of our clothing at Dia&Co, but only after a journey through failed models and approaches. I will discuss lessons learned from this journey as well as the successful, deep learning-based approach.
title: Diving into the deep end of clothing styles
